value.title: 4 AI tools to help you reach your marketing goals

value.title: Microsoft Azure Space Partners with HPE for Spaceborne Computer-2 Launch
value.excerpt: Microsoft Azure Space is now working with Hewlett Packard Enterprise on its Spaceborne Computer-2 supercomputer.

value.title: New machine learning theory raises questions about nature of science
value.excerpt: A novel computer algorithm, or set of rules, that accurately predicts the orbits of planets in the solar system could be adapted to better predict and control the behavior of the plasma that fuels fusion facilities designed to harvest on Earth the fusion energy that powers the sun and stars.

value.title: What if Artificial Intelligence Decided How to Allocate Stimulus Money?
value.excerpt: New Treasury Department software points the way. But research suggests that it’s impossible to show that an artificial “superintelligence” can be contained.

value.title: Canon's New iOS App Uses AI To Marie Kondo Your Digital Photo Hoarding
value.excerpt: Even without the limits of a 36-shot roll of film or memory cards that quickly max out, it doesn’t take long to fill an iPhone and cloud storage with photos. So Canon has released an iOS app that can make the hard decisions for you when it’s time to clear out some memories using AI to objectively decide which shots aren’t worth keeping.

value.title: Deep Learning? Sometimes It Pays To Go Shallow
value.excerpt: Deep learning is the current darling of AI. Used by behemoths such as Microsoft, Google and Amazon, it leverages artificial neural networks that “learn” through exposure to immense amounts of data. By immense we mean internet-scale amounts — or billions of documents at a minimum.

value.title: Sweden’s data watchdog slaps police for unlawful use of Clearview AI
value.excerpt: Sweden’s data protection authority, the IMY, has fined the local police authority €250,000 ($300k+) for unlawful use of the controversial facial recognition software, Clearview AI, in breach of the country’s Criminal Data Act.

value.title: Using Machine Learning To Create Better Gene Therapies
value.excerpt: Machine learning study initiated at the Wyss Institute in collaboration with Google Research enables unprecedented AAV capsid diversification with potential for improving gene therapies.

value.title: Valentine’s Day Your Hotel Might Have This AI Bed Funded By Adobe Founder John Warnock
value.excerpt: As Elon Musk, Larry Ellison and Peter Thiel flee California in the tech exodus, Adobe co-founder John Warnock remains unfazed. value.title: CBP Facial Recognition Scanners Failed to Find a Single Imposter At Airports in 2020

value.title: 5 Ways For Startups To Take Advantage Of AI
value.excerpt: Others use AI to improve everything from customer service operations to digital marketing. Up until recently though, the best AI solutions were only accessible to big, well-funded corporations. Now, that's no longer the case.

value.title: New AI technique allows robots to detect human touch by analyzing shadows
value.excerpt: Scientists from Cornell University say the method provides a low-cost way for robots to identify physical interactions with humans.

value.title: "Face control": Russian police go digital against protesters
value.excerpt: Georgy Malets didn't make it to an anti-Kremlin rally last month. He was detained on his way there by police using facial recognition technology in the Moscow metro.

value.title: The Nine Ground Rules For A Driving Robot That Can Drive A Non-Driverless Car
value.excerpt: These are the nine key ground rules for devising a driving robot that will turn any car into essentially a self-driving car.

value.title: Nvidia: Researchers train AI to reward dogs for responding to commands

value.title: ‘Hear’ this Kandinsky painting with Google’s psychedelic AI tool
